name: SUCC
description:
You need to vacuum your room. That's about it.

Use your vacuum to suck up the dust that is laying around the room. you must connect the vacuum to the electrical outlet for the vacuum to function, but the cord isn't very long, so you must plug and unplug your vacuum to different electrical outlets to progress.

Move using the UP or DOWN arrows, or W and S, and turn using the LEFT and RIGHT arrows, or A and D.

Use SPACE to pick up the vacuum or the vacuum cord. Press R to reset.

Although this isn't my first game jam, this is my first time truly participating in a game jam, as well as my first uploaded project in Unity, so expect a lot of bugs ;)
